translations: 玩女人的男人（等于 womanizer）

sentences.sentence: Like his on-screen character Joey, Le Blanc has a reputation as a womaniser.
sentences.translation: 就像他在剧中扮演的乔伊一样，勒布朗也有女人风流缘。

sentences.sentence: Nevertheless, he was a womaniser with uncalculated conquests and seven known children.
sentences.translation: 然而，他却是一位爱玩弄女性的人，一时冲动就会俘虏女人的心，而就目前所知，他已经有了七个孩子。

sentences.sentence: Palace officials will be furious about allegations that the Duke of Edinburgh was a womaniser and drinker made in a new two-part Channel 5 documentary.
sentences.translation: 五频道一部分为上下两集的纪录片称爱丁堡公爵是个花花公子、好酒之徒，白金汉宫的官员听闻可要火冒三丈了。
